about_the_game:
This is the first Chapter of the Sprite Sequence saga! A delightfully wacky story about the process of creation and being human.

Follow our little hero as he tries to make sense of the strange and sometimes frightening world he's been thrown in.

Key Features :
- Story oriented
- Light puzzle and platforming
- About 10 to 20 minutes long
- Hand-drawn and animated
- The adventure continues in Sprite Sequence Chapter 2!

This project started in 2016 as a way to try and make games like a webcomic is done : by releasing a small bit of the story every week. This improvisation based process gave rise to a game I wouldn't have wrote otherwise and I'm quite excited to share this first Chapter with you, that compiles the 10 first entries of the project.

(Note that the weekly creation has halted after Chapter 2 but may resume in some not so near future)
